element.name: list
element.examplexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <list> <flowStatistics> <node> <type>...</type> <id>...</id> </node> <flowStatistic> <packetCount>...</packetCount> <flow> <id>...</id> <actions> <type>...</type> </actions> <actions> <!--...--> </actions> <!--...more "actions" elements...--> <priority>...</priority> <match> <matchField /> <matchField> <!--...--> </matchField> <!--...more "matchField" elements...--> </match> <idleTimeout>...</idleTimeout> <hardTimeout>...</hardTimeout> </flow> <tableId>...</tableId> <byteCount>...</byteCount> <durationNanoseconds>...</durationNanoseconds> <durationSeconds>...</durationSeconds> </flowStatistic> <flowStatistic> <!--...--> </flowStatistic> <!--...more "flowStatistic" elements...--> </flowStatistics> <flowStatistics> <!--...--> </flowStatistics> <!--...more "flowStatistics" elements...--> </list>

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all Flow Statistics from all the Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Port Statistics across all the NodeConnectors on all the Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Table Statistics on all Nodes.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of Flow Statistics for a given Node.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
Node Type as specifid in org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node class
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Port Statistics across all the NodeConnectors in a given Node.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
Node Type as specifid in org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node class
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of all the Table Statistics on a specific node.
operation.parameter: Name of the Container. The Container name for the base controller is "default".
Node Type as specified in org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node class (e.g. OF for Openflow)
operation.statusCode: One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

group.name: StatisticsNorthbound
group.documentation:
Northbound APIs that returns various Statistics exposed by the Southbound protocol plugins such as Openflow.

Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
Authentication realm : opendaylight
Transport : HTTP and HTTPS

HTTPS Authentication is disabled by default.
